name: pnp-powerplatform-prompts-social-media-tracker-for-analytics
title: Social Media Tracker for Analytics
shortDescription: This prompt helps with tracking social media product announcement posts for later analysis.
longDescription: This is a starter for a social media tracker looking at the main details typically used for Analysis

metadata.value: I am a Product Manager who wants a social media tracker of our phone/cloud apps. Track important metrics to help me make good analytical decisions about the effect and reach of announcement with a multi-select choice of social Media venues.
